wikitext.*:
'''The Hunter''' could be referring to the following:
* [[Folca]], thirteenth [[Kings of Rohan|King]] of [[Rohan]] who died capturing the [[Boar of Everholt]].
* [[Haleth]], female [[Chieftain of the Haladin]] during the [[First Age]].
* [[Hunter and Rider|Hunter]], an illusive figure of Elven legends.
* [[Mablung]], a [[First Age]] [[Elves|Elf]] of [[Doriath]] who accompanied [[Beren]] in the [[Hunting of the Wolf]].
* [[Oromë]], one of the [[Valar]], known as ''Huntsman of the Valar''.
* [[Vorondil]], a [[Stewards of Gondor|Steward of Gondor]] who killed the [[Kine of Araw]].
* [[Thû]], the Necromancer of the [[Tol-in-Gaurhoth|Wizard's Isle]].
{{Disambig}}
